titleStmt.title: A perfect list of the many victories by Gods blessing upon the Parliaments forces under the command of his excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax since the 14. of June last 1645. to this present month of April, Anno. Dom. 1646. with the names of the garrisons, towns, and castlestaken [sic] from the enemy.
titleStmt.author: Ricraft, Josiah, fl. 1645-1679.

titleStmt.title: A perfect list of the many victories by Gods blessing upon the Parliaments forces under the command of his excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax since the 14. of June last 1645. to this present month of April, Anno. Dom. 1646. with the names of the garrisons, towns, and castlestaken [sic] from the enemy.
titleStmt.author: Ricraft, Josiah, fl. 1645-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for John Hancock, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Ally, neer the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Collected by Josiah Ricraft.
